attributes.action: For those 51% who voted to leave the EU, stop Kier Starmer taking us back in
attributes.additional_details: Because a referendum was held the people voted, and this should be respected and upheld by all Governments now and in the future for this country
attributes.background: A huge turnout for the referendum to leave the EU voted in favour of this, those people do not want their vote over turning by a Government that does not support the people who voted for change

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The Government have not announced any plans to re-join the EU.
